## Table of Contents

### Classes

#### Public Classes

* [`openvoxview`](#openvoxview): Main class, includes all other classes

#### Private Classes

* `openvoxview::config`: This class handles the OpenVox View config.
* `openvoxview::install`: This class handles the OpenVox View installation.
* `openvoxview::service`: This class handles the OpenVox View Service.

### <a name="openvoxview"></a>`openvoxview`

Main class, includes all other classes

##### <a name="-openvoxview--version"></a>`version`

Data type: `String`

Which version should be installed

Default value: `'0.1.18'`

##### <a name="-openvoxview--manage_config_dir"></a>`manage_config_dir`

Data type: `Boolean`

Should this module manage the config dir

Default value: `true`

##### <a name="-openvoxview--config_dir"></a>`config_dir`

Data type: `Stdlib::Absolutepath`

Path to the config dir

Default value: `'/etc/openvox'`

##### <a name="-openvoxview--config_file"></a>`config_file`

Data type: `String`

Config File name

Default value: `'openvox.yml'`

##### <a name="-openvoxview--manage_user"></a>`manage_user`

Data type: `Boolean`

Whether or not the module should create the user.

Default value: `true`

##### <a name="-openvoxview--openvoxview_user"></a>`openvoxview_user`

Data type: `String`

The user used by the OpenVox View process.

Default value: `'openvoxview'`

##### <a name="-openvoxview--manage_group"></a>`manage_group`

Data type: `Boolean`

Whether or not the module should create the group.

Default value: `true`

##### <a name="-openvoxview--openvoxview_group"></a>`openvoxview_group`

Data type: `String`

The group used by the OpenVox View process.

Default value: `'openvoxview'`

##### <a name="-openvoxview--manage_service"></a>`manage_service`

Data type: `Boolean`

Should the module manage the service

Default value: `true`

##### <a name="-openvoxview--manage_systemd_unit"></a>`manage_systemd_unit`

Data type: `Boolean`

Whether or not the module should create the systemd unit file.

Default value: `true`

##### <a name="-openvoxview--service_name"></a>`service_name`

Data type: `String`

Name of the service (if manage_service is true)

Default value: `'openvoxview'`

##### <a name="-openvoxview--service_ensure"></a>`service_ensure`

Data type: `Boolean`

Whether the service should be running or stopped.

Default value: `true`

##### <a name="-openvoxview--service_enable"></a>`service_enable`

Data type: `Boolean`

Whether the service should be enabled or disabled.

Default value: `true`

##### <a name="-openvoxview--listen_address"></a>`listen_address`

Data type: `String`

Listen address

Default value: `'127.0.0.1'`

##### <a name="-openvoxview--listen_port"></a>`listen_port`

Data type: `Integer[1024, 65535]`

Port for service

Default value: `5000`

##### <a name="-openvoxview--puppetdb_host"></a>`puppetdb_host`

Data type: `String`

Address to the puppetdb host

Default value: `'localhost'`

##### <a name="-openvoxview--puppetdb_port"></a>`puppetdb_port`

Data type: `Integer`

PuppetDB port

Default value: `8080`

##### <a name="-openvoxview--puppetdb_tls"></a>`puppetdb_tls`

Data type: `Boolean`

Is the connection to PuppetDB ssl encrypted

Default value: `false`

##### <a name="-openvoxview--puppetdb_tls_ignore"></a>`puppetdb_tls_ignore`

Data type: `Boolean`

Should a insecure connection to PuppetDB be allowed

Default value: `true`

##### <a name="-openvoxview--predefined_pql_queries"></a>`predefined_pql_queries`

Data type: `Array[Hash]`

Array of predefined queries

Default value: `[]`

##### <a name="-openvoxview--predefined_views"></a>`predefined_views`

Data type: `Array[Hash]`

Array of predefined views

Default value: `[]`

##### <a name="-openvoxview--puppetdb_tls_ca_path"></a>`puppetdb_tls_ca_path`

Data type: `Optional[Stdlib::Absolutepath]`

Path to the CA file

Default value: `undef`

##### <a name="-openvoxview--puppetdb_tls_key_path"></a>`puppetdb_tls_key_path`

Data type: `Optional[Stdlib::Absolutepath]`

Path to the PuppetDB key file

Default value: `undef`

##### <a name="-openvoxview--puppetdb_tls_cert_path"></a>`puppetdb_tls_cert_path`

Data type: `Optional[Stdlib::Absolutepath]`

Path to the PuppetDB cert file

Default value: `undef`

##### <a name="-openvoxview--download_url"></a>`download_url`

Data type: `Stdlib::HTTPUrl`

URL to download the OpenVox View binary tarball from

Default value: `"https://github.com/voxpupuli/openvoxview/releases/download/v${version}/openvoxview_${version}_linux_amd64.tar.gz"`

##### <a name="-openvoxview--install_method"></a>`install_method`

Data type: `Enum['archive', 'package']`

Installation method, either 'archive' or 'package'

Default value: `'archive'`
